reviews.review_msg: Caveat: you MUST very carefully understand everything that happens if you want to succeed.  Ray is not the easiest guy to understand, but if you give him a chance you'll find he really cares about his students.  Logic is a powerful, fascinating thing, and all he wants is to teach people how to use it.  Take a chance!  Take his course!

An extremely kind man.  Wants his students to like logic and is available anytime.  Participates in extra curricular activities with students and is always available to talk about logic or otherwise interesting topics.
Can't explain anything to phil students. Unless you're a compsci don't even try!
In the course currently... he seems quite good... no clue on difficulty
